Blog.post: Y Good to Have You Home Suzanne!! Y
I want to have a night for playing pool and drinking (always a good combination). Anyone interested, and when would be good for you people?

Hey Ya'll, Just thought I would let you all know that I am moving as of September 1 to a different apartment in thte same building. I also have to paint the place, so here is the deal. I would greatly appreciate any help you can give in either the helping to move or the painting. Thanks guys.

She's coming home a different woman, Katherine now drinks beer! To celebrate I propose we make plans to visit Brewsters or Savoys or anyplace with with a large diverse beer menu. Of course we don't need to be beer connoisseurs, we could go for $1.50 pints at Filthy McNasty's on a Wednesday. In any case, she will be back in four weeks so I suggest we aim for Wednesday, September 1. Does anyone have any suggestions?

Suzanne comes back today, Wednesday, July 28. So... Adriane and I were planning on going out for some drinks after work tomorrow. How about we start at 6:00 PM at Devlins? Mmm... martinis... OUCH.... expensive

It's so nice here! There's tonnes to do: eat, shop, and the nite life is absolutely spectacular!! All the nite life is centered in one area, so it's only one ride...and there's reward for getting in early, which is no cover and the places fill up fast!! The only downside to the T-dot is that it's so busy and humid here. I don't think I could handle that as a hick Albertan :)

HEY EVERYONE!!! I want to thank everyone for coming out to my party! I had SUCH a blast and hope you guys did too. it wont feel like im gone at all cause i'll be blogging lots. thanks again for all your support and such, i have all your addresses so i will make sure to send out postcards! thanks to anyone else who couldnt make it cause u know, you guys are awesome too!
Sorry fellas... Unca's Old Boys is playing next Wednesday. Adriane and i are going, luv to see you there!

Hey this BLOG is awesome. I guess jessica Mcginnis took my board posting suggestion to heart eh? Sorry about this week guys, I am genuinely super busy because I have to wrap ends up before I leave for TO this weekend. Have fun though okay?
My favorite band, The Corb Lund Band , is playing at the SideTrack on July 31. Adriane and I are going and if there are still tickets left i strongly urge you to attend. Tix @ Blackbird, $12.
My second favorite local band, The Floor , is playing @ Suburds on Friday nite. i know we have Wela's thing but i'm going to go after the Druid if anyone wants to join me.
Unca's Old Boys are playing @ the SideTrack tonight. i don't think i'm going but i thought i'd let y'all know.

Here is a copy of Dana's Meet Night Email: Date: Thursday, July 22 Time: 7:00 PM Location: Yeoman's Steakhouse, 107 Street and South of Jasper Ave (It doesn't look like much but Shane says they serve the best steak. Also, it is far more accessible than Montana's for those of us without vehicles!) If you are unsure of where to find Yeoman's Steakhouse, you can meet at Suzanne's place (Douglas Manor on the corner of 83 Ave and 108 St) at 6:15 PM and we can bus over or walk over depending on the mood of those who meet. Please RSVP to me by next Tuesday, July 20 so I can make reservations. I can be reached via email, or you can phone and leave a message at 721-9092.

Here is a copy of Wela's party invite... -Where: The Druid at 11606 Jasper Ave. -When: July 23, 2004 (Friday) starting at 7PM. I will be there right at 7PM and will be having dinner there. I'll be staying there till the wee hours in the morning so come when you can between 7PM till like 1 AM Please RSVP to me by July 19th at urlLink wlth@hotmail.com , urlLink wzquan@ualberta.ca or on my cell at 604-7434. I encourage all of you to bring friends and significant others cause the more the merrier! If you cannot make it, please let me know too cause we could have a drink some other time you're free before I go!

Hey all! So, due to some serious computer issues, I will NOT have access to e-mail/blogging for at least a week (egad! I know). If you would like to get a hold of me, give me a shout at 474.2261. I know telephones are primeval, but it's all I've got. Thank god for a day off and EPL to check some important stuff! Like: Cheers and CONGRATS to SUZANNE & JESSICA. You both rock and deserve such splendid jobs. And: Hope y'all enjoy those crazy hijinx coming up!
Whitey Houston and Vertical Struts @ Side Track on Thursday for the Whitey Houston 7" release.

yes yes congrats to suzanne for the acquisition of the job as a comic book nerd. NERD!! ahahah. going out is now pronounce good for friday and saturday and I hope everyone else had just as much fun as I did :) I even slept well :) of course, we all got nice and drunk and many guys whistled. it was good fun :)
wahahahahaha' i work at a comic book store now. i am totally going to take over the world . . .die suckers die! oh . . .i mean . . .hey . . .how you doin'? *wink*

Hey guys, I know I'm not on here much, but my course and everything just finished so I just posted on the other posting that I would like to do the mission in the mall thing if you still need a fourth, however, I'm a little nervous about pledges I dunno I'm really bad at getting them cuz I hate asking people for money. But anyways, if Dana hasn't already asked her dad or her little sister (very cool btw) I could do it I think. Also, I'm really sorry I missed fringing, I need to check this more often, but I will try to make it to Emilys for family guy, provided eventually someone emails me her address and times and stuff, and where to park lol! Talk to you guys later. Jenna
I got the job!
FRINGE ROCKS!!! IT'S LIKE THE BEST FESTIVAL IN EDMONTON!!! I'M SO EXCITED!!!!!! I'M PICKING UP A PROGRAM GUIDE TONIGHT....I CAN'T WAIT!!!!

I need to stop cavorting with mind-numbing immature 15-year olds. In other words, please take me away from the Village. Please!!!! I was thinking of doing some Fringe-walking/talking next Wednesday. Maybe even catching a show? If anyone is interested or has heard of some incredible show, let me know, let me know.
So i suggest Vons off whyte, near the end of august. What do ya'll think?

I think we all should take a moment and welcome Jessica L for FINALLY joining. Good thing you did cause I was about to start a nasty thread about you which you would only get to read if you joined. A little trick I learned from some very dirty americans. Anyway, nice to have you around Jessica L. ;)

Hey Ya'll, Laurie, Emily & I would like to hit Whyte Ave Friday night for a little drinking, probably some dancing and a whole lotta having some fun. We figure that Whyte Ave would be super cool since all the people from the Fringe will be there. Emily has already vetoed the Iron Horse. There are plans for pre-gaming since alcohol is so expense. Update will be posted once known. I am guessing pre-gaming will happen at my place since I live on Whyte. People are also free to spend the night as I do believe some of us are going ot head out to the Fringe the next day. Hope to hear from you all regarding this matter!! Cheers and Good Wishes

We all need some silliness to break up the day. Follow the instructions to find your new name. The following in an excerpt from a children's book, "Captain Underpants And the Perilous Plot of Professor Poopypants" by Dave Pilkey. The evil Professor forces everyone to assume new names...... Use the third letter of your first name to determine your new first name: a=poopsie b=lumpy c=buttercup d=gadget e=crusty f=greasy g=fluffy h=cheeseball i=chim-chim j=stinky k=flunky l=bootie m=pinky n=zippy o=goober p=doofus q=slimy r=loopy s=snotty t=tootie u=dorkey v=squeezit w=oprah x=skipper y=dinky z=zsa-zsa Use the second letter of your last name to determine the first half of your new last name: a=apple b=toilet c=giggle d=burger e=girdle f=barf g=lizard h=waffle i=cootie j=monkey k=potty l=liver m=banana n =rhino o=bubble p=hamster q=toad r=gizzard s=pizza t=gerbil u=chicken v=pickle w=chuckle x=tofu y=gorilla z=stinker Use the fourth letter of your last name to determine the second half of your new last name: a=head b=mouth c=face d=nose e=tush f=breath g=pants h=shorts i=lips j=honker k=butt l=brain m=tushie n=biscuits o=hiney p=chunks q=toes r=buns s=fanny t=sniffer u=sprinkles v=kisser w=squirt x=humperdinck y=brains z=juice
I think we should get together sometime. If anyone ever reads this. BLAH!

Hey all, I think we should enter the "mission in the mall." it's like amazing race but in west ed. you collect pledges and try to win. heck, i suck at explainging this so check out the website. urlLink www.missioninthemall.com oooo pretty colours

So here's a question: What's everyone's "type"? suzanne and I just encountered a hot outdoorsy mountain man(I swear, from the mouth of suzanne) in the office, and whoo! We both had to be hosed down(of course suzanne has dibs). What's everyone else's type? I, personally, am not usually a swarthy-mountain-man type but more of a toned, athletic slim hairy dude type. Any others?

Hallo ppl It seems so many people have so many plans this weekend but little ol' me. So if you are like me and want something to do to entertain and possibly rock your socks off give me a shout. 424-6960

HALO l HALO l HALO l HALO l HALO i will be attending halo on friday, aug 6 and would love to see you all there as well. i plan to be there for 10:00pm but, as some may know i have a tedency of being a bit late and i do have a photo shoot in spruce grove in the early evening. hope to see you, otherwise - you suck...

tuna casserole....Oh yeah! for those who are fans of the Family Guy show, there is going to be a marathon type thing on Fox on august 18 and 25(both wedensdays, from 8-10p) where they show 4 episodes back to back! Fox has decided to let Family Guy air the 4th season in 2005!! Which is friggin awesome because I love that show. Anyways, this is an invite to my apartment on both those days for some Family Guy action. it'll be good times, we can drink beer and act obnoxious like Peter Griffin and say politically incorrect statements. How about it?

So I have no idea where it will be, but if anyone on the blog is up for wings on Wednesday(aug 4), that would be awesome! It would serve as a buffer just in case Suzanne and her dream man don't hit it off so well :) Joel and some of his friends will also be there, and we're thinking about 8 pm. Interested? let me know emwong@ualberta.ca

So the T-dot was pretty friggin humid, and now I have no money, which equals a good vacation I guess :) I am now back at work with SFAIC and of course all student cases are back in my face ARGH!! tuna casserole is pretty damn good when it's made with freshly made noodles from Marchelino Movenpicks :) only in ontario!!!
